name: abracademic
description: Scholarly URL rewriter for faster access via institutional proxies and open access sources

scripts.build:chrome: cross-env TARGET=chrome node build.js && cross-env TARGET=chrome node scripts/build-manifest.mjs
scripts.build:firefox: cross-env TARGET=firefox node build.js && cross-env TARGET=firefox node scripts/build-manifest.mjs
scripts.build:safari: cross-env TARGET=safari node build.js && cross-env TARGET=safari node scripts/build-manifest.mjs
scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:safari
